name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Final Sign Off
Acceptance Criteria - All below requirements are met and approved by CR
Verifying Document - Referenced Item numbers as below
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Sampled from truck or stockpile onsite as per NZS4402 clasue 1.6.3 & 1.6.4
Acceptance Criteria - CBR > 40 as per NZS4402
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Samples to be sent to lab for testing or provided by quarry
Acceptance Criteria - QI = AA, AB, AC, BA, BB, CA, CB as per NZS4407 1991 Test 3.11
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Samples to be sent to lab for testing or provided by quarry
Acceptance Criteria - Grading within envelope as per table 302.2.3 (Technical Specifications) Tested in accordance with NZS4407 1991 Test 3.8.1
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pre-Cut/Fill Survey
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Onsite Setout
Acceptance Criteria - Survey have setout using pegs or similar, the location of the pavement in regards to horizontal and vertical alignment, as per design.
2.2.3 - Visual inspection of final trimmed subgrade surface
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pre pavement construction visual inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Entire surface to be firm, uniform and smooth.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Proof Roll
Acceptance Criteria - Surface impression not greater than:
○ Using 11t Smooth Drum Roller or equivalent.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Wet density measure
Acceptance Criteria - See TNZ F-1 1997 Clause 10.5.2 Non Granular Material
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - DCP Testing
Acceptance Criteria - Equivilant CBR value of ≥ 2%
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Straight edge, as-built and inspection
Acceptance Criteria - No point varying more than 30mm on a 3m straight edge laid parallel to centreline, or x-section camber board at 90° to centreline. No ponding where design slope ≥ 2%
○ Survey data / As-built drawings to be submitted to engineer.
Verifying Document - Straight Edge form, as-built survey data, visual inspection
